articles.title: Fashion goes soft as Fendi turns boots into slippers - The Guardian

articles.title: Netflix's Bridgerton sparks social media trend for making dresses and corsets - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bridgerton fans have been recreating the early-19th century look portrayed in Netflix's hit show. And British search engine Lyst now claims demand for corsets and empire line dresses has soared.
articles.content:
It's been the lockdown must-watch, but it seems Bridgerton is now inspiring how we dress, with fans donning Regency-era style garments and sharing their looks on social media.
